email_body: Congratulations! You've been selected for a free vacation package. Claim your reward now: http://fraudulentlink.com
Can you send me the updated report by end of the day? Thanks!
URGENT: Your PayPal account has been restricted. Verify your details here: http://scamlink.com
Reminder: Team lunch scheduled for Friday at noon. Let me know if you can make it.
Final notice: Your subscription is about to expire. Renew now to avoid losing access: http://phishingscam.com
Great job on the presentation today! Looking forward to working on the next steps.
Your Amazon package has been delayed. Track your order here: http://fakeamazontracking.com
Quick question—what’s the deadline for submitting our proposal?
Action required: Unusual activity detected in your banking account. Secure it here: http://fakebank.com
Thanks for your help on the project! Really appreciate your input.
Claim your free Bitcoin now! Limited time offer: http://bitcoingiveaway.com
Meeting rescheduled to 3 PM instead of 2 PM. Hope that works for you!
You've received a digital gift card! Redeem it here: http://fraudsite.com
Looking forward to our catch-up call next week. Let me know if we need to reschedule.
Warning: Your email storage is full. Click here to upgrade: http://fakeemailprovider.com
Happy Birthday! Hope you have a fantastic day!
